fn._schema.///: Get the jAPI `schema` of this server.

fn._unknown.///: A placeholder function when the requested function is unknown.

struct._ValidationFailure.///: A validation failure located at a `path` explained by a `reason`.

trait._Validated.///: All functions may return a validation error:
trait._Validated.//1: - `_invalidRequestTarget`: The Target on the Request is invalid due to a `reason`
trait._Validated.//2: - `_invalidRequestHeaders`: The Headers on the Request is invalid as outlined by a list of `cases`.
trait._Validated.//3: - `_invalidRequestBody`: The Body on the Request is invalid as outlined by a list of `cases`.
trait._Validated.//4: - `_invalidResponseBody`: The Body that the Server attempted to put on the Response is invalid as
trait._Validated.//6: - `_parseFailure`: The Request could not be parsed as a jAPI Message.
